title: Sinister Offering

properties.name: description
properties.value: Sinister Offering is a spell within the Arceuus spellbook that requires level 92 Magic and the completion of A Kingdom Divided to be cast. When cast, the spell instantly offers up to three bones in the player's inventory, granting three times the normal experience for burying them. If converting superior dragon bones, players will require level 70 Prayer to offer them via the spell. Players may only cast offering spells once every 4.8 seconds.

content:
Sinister Offering
Released 16 June 2021 (Update)
Members Yes
Level 92
Spellbook Arceuus
Type Utility
Experience 180
Runes 1 1
Cooldown 8 ticks
Quest A Kingdom Divided
Description Converts bones into prayer points and experience
Animation
Sound Effect

Sinister Offering is a spell within the Arceuus spellbook that requires level 92 Magic and the completion of A Kingdom Divided to be cast. When cast, the spell instantly offers up to three bones in the player's inventory, granting three times the normal experience for burying them. If converting superior dragon bones, players will require level 70 Prayer to offer them via the spell. Players may only cast offering spells once every 4.8 seconds.

The spell also restores one prayer point for each set of bones converted; for Ourg, dagannoth, hydra, and superior dragon bones, two prayer points are restored instead.

Bat bones 15.9 47.7 −43.63 28,620
Big bones 45 135 −9.81 81,000
Jogre bones 45 135 −31.21 81,000
Zogre bones 67.5 202.5 −10.05 121,500
Shaikahan bones 75 225 −79.32 135,000
Babydragon bones 90 270 −11.46 162,000
Wyrm bones 150 450 −11.31 270,000
Dragon bones 216 648 −14.19 388,800
Wyvern bones 216 648 −13.83 388,800
Drake bones 240 720 −15.74 432,000
Fayrg bones 252 756 −14.53 453,600
Lava dragon bones 255 765 −21.3 459,000
Raurg bones 288 864 −18.88 518,400
Hydra bones 330 990 −20.01 594,000
Dagannoth bones 375 1125 −25.08 675,000
Ourg bones 420 1260 −78.72 756,000
Superior dragon bones 450 1350 −27.43 810,000
  1. ^ Assumes three bones per cast
  2. ^ Assuming 600 casts per hour, gaining 108,000 per hour.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
4 August 2021
(update)

The spell can now be performed without interrupting the player's actions.

30 June 2021
(update)

Offering spells are now cast instantly, and have a cooldown of 8 game ticks (4.8 seconds).
